articles.content:
S. Korean authorities' naval provocations condemned
   Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A worker's rally to condemn the South Korean authorities' provocations in the West Sea of Korea was held at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex on Monday.   At the rally the speakers denounced criminal acts  committed by the South Korean authorities at the instigation of the U.S., recalling that they have illegally infiltrated warships into the territorial waters of the north side since June 4 to threaten the safety of our fishermen at work and even made armed provocations against patrol boats of the people's army on routine patrol duty.   
   They said the reckless moves of the U.S. and the South Korean authorities to unleash a war against the north were an intolerable challenge to the DPRK and a deliberate and premeditated attempt to ignite a new war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
   They strongly demanded that the South Korean authorities stop running wild, clearly mindful that there is no limit to our merciless punishment to provocateurs, aggressors, and promptly halt infiltration into the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK.

articles.content:
Meetings for remembering Kim Il Sung held 
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering the President Kim Il Sung were held in Ulaan Baatar of Mongolia and at the India International News Bureau on June 21 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.   the great exploits achieved by the president for the Korean and world revolution were praised at the meetings.   The participants of the meeting in Mongolia planted trees wishing the President an eternal life.

articles.title: Anti-corruption legislation demanded
articles.content:
Italy-DPRK Friendship and Cooperation Association formed
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Italy-DPRK Friendship and Cooperation Association was formed on June 21.   The inauguration meeting adopted the statute of the association, keynote of which calls for energetic  activities to boost the relations  between Italy and the DPRK in political, economic and cultural fields and promote the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.   Chairman of the association was elected and its immediate action programme was discussed at the meeting.

articles.title: International solidarity with Korean people expressed
articles.content:
Anti-corruption legislation demanded
   Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- 195 South Korean civic organizations, including the "Citizens' Federation for Democratic Society" and the "Citizens Federation for Economic Justice" on June 24 held a joint press conference at which they called for the overall introduction of special prosecution system and prompt institution of an anti-corruption  law, according to a Seoul-based radio report.
   The organizations held that the "special prosecution system" which South Korean authorities are going to introduce, limiting its application to the case of inducing the mint company trade unions to strike was, in fact, nothing but a "temporary remedy to tide over their crisis" and called for the full enforcement of the special prosecution system.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, great brilliant commander and military genius
articles.content:
International solidarity with Korean people expressed
   Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Russia and the Czech Republic in the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.   Vladimir Tolstikov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said that the Korean people honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country in the war of aggression unleashed by the U.S. imperialists in the '50s and showed that Korea was invincible.   They have turned their country into a prospering socialist one under the wise guidance of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for nearly 50 years since the war, he noted.   
   Speakers said at the meetings that the recent provocations committed by the South Korean authorities in the west sea of Korea were the wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK and deliberate moves to ignite a new war by aggravating the tensions on the Korean peninsula.
   The proposals for Korea's reunification advanced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are evoking great sympathy among the South Korean people, they said, and noted: "The Korean people will certainly reunify the country."
   A letter of solidarity to Kim Jong Il was adopted in Russia and a telegram of solidarity to him in the Czech Republic.

articles.content:
Greetings to Congolese President
   Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings on Monday to Laurent Desire Kabila, President of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence.   The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further strengthen and develop. It sincerely wished the President and people of Congo great success in their work to defend the nation's sovereignty and territorial integrity.
